table.name: vtiger_hylafax_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_hylafax_settings` ( `settings_name` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `settings_value` text CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`settings_name`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
